function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased home fitness and wellness areas may lead to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly maintained and sanitized.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among household members and visitors.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of home fitness and wellness areas, as well as implementation of strict hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Home air purifiers, UV-C sanitizing devices, and smart health monitoring systems.","People":"Household members, visitors, and pet animals.","Owner":"Homeowners, property managers, and home builders."},{"Description":"Rapid increase in pet ownership and demand for pet-friendly rentals can lead to the spread of zoonotic diseases.","Impact":"Potential transmission of zoonotic diseases from pets to humans and among pet animals.","Mitigation":"Regular veterinary check-ups for pets, strict hygiene practices, and education on zoonotic disease prevention.","Technologies":"Pet health monitoring devices, pet waste management systems, and air purifiers for pet-inhabited spaces.","People":"Pet owners, renters, and landlords.","Owner":"Pet owners, landlords, and property managers."},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and sanitation in shared pet-friendly spaces may contribute to the transmission of diseases among pet owners and their animals.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among pet owners and their pets in shared spaces.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, regular cleaning and disinfection of shared spaces, and education on disease prevention for pet owners.","Technologies":"Smart monitoring systems for shared spaces, touchless amenities, and air purification systems.","People":"Pet owners, landlords, and property managers.","Owner":"Property managers, building owners, and pet owners."}]}
